sense.def:
A patch
je kos blaga ali drugega materiala; z njim prekrijemo luknjo v nečem.

seg.quote: I mended holes in the sheets by sewing on square patches.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
patches something that has a hole in it
, nekaj, kar ima luknjo, prekrije z zaplato.

seg.quote: Anne sat by the fire, patching a pair of jeans.

sense.def:
An eye patch
je košček blaga ali drugega materiala, ki ga človek nosi prek poškodovanega očesa.

Na neki površini je
a patch
tisti del, ki je drugačen od površine okoli sebe.

seg.quote: ...the damp patch at the corner of the ceiling.

sense.def:
Izraz
patch
lahko uporabljamo tudi za obdobje v življenju ali obstoju nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: The country was going through a bad patch.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
patches up something
, popravi nekaj, kar je poškodovano.

seg.quote: They have to patch up the mud walls that the rains have battered.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
patches up a quarrel with someone
, se neha prepirati in obnovi prijateljstvo.

seg.quote: They tried to patch things up.
